news.title: Inflation rate hits 2.8% in February, less than expected
news.summary: The consumer price index was expected to increase 0.3% in February and 3.2% from a year ago. The Consumer Price Index is a measure of inflation in the United States.

news.title: We 'must act': Europe retaliates against Trump's 25% tariffs on steel and aluminum imports
news.summary: The European Union said it would impose counter-tariffs on 26 billion euros ($28.33 billion) worth of U.S. goods starting in April.

news.title: Weekly mortgage demand surges 11% higher, as interest rates dropped for the sixth straight week
news.summary: Mortgage demand for both homebuying and refinancing reacted to yet another drop in mortgage rates. Mortgage rates are now down for the sixth straight week.

news.title: Ray Dalio warns that mounting U.S. debt problems could lead to ‘shocking developments'
news.summary: Bridgewater founder Ray Dalio warns of a "very severe" supply-demand problem regarding U.S. debt. Dalio: "Very severe" problem could lead to shocking developments.

news.title: Moscow wary of 'jumping the gun' after the U.S. and Ukraine unite over a ceasefire deal
news.summary: The Kremlin broke silence on Wednesday, delivering its initial reaction to Kyiv and the White House's unilateral agreement proposing a temporary ceasefire. The Kremlin said Kyiv's offer of a ceasefire was the only way to resolve the crisis.

news.title: Airline profits hit turbulence from Q1’s ‘parade of horribles’
news.summary: Cowen analysts expect airline stocks to remain volatile. TD Cowen: Airline stocks could remain volatile in the near term. The airline sector is expected to remain in the red for the rest of the year.

news.title: Treasury yields edge up after CPI inflation data comes in cooler than expected
news.summary: Consumer-price index report for February came in cooler than Wall Street expected. Bond yields turned higher Wednesday after the consumer-price report came in lower than expected.

news.title: Why it’s harder for Generation X to save for retirement than it was for baby boomers
news.summary: The next generation of retirees isn’t feeling so confident about the future. “I’m worried about my future,” one woman says.

news.title: Goldman Sachs flinches and lowers its S&P 500 target. The mechanics are the interesting part.
news.summary: Wall Street strategists struggle to hold their nerve in the face of the ever-changing tariff policy. It’s been tough for Wall Street Strategists to holding their nerve.

news.title: Believe in Elon Musk’s $1 trillion ‘waste and fraud’ jackpot when you see it
news.summary: Musk is right about one thing: Absolutely no reasonable person should support waste or fraud in the federal government. He is also right about the fact that the U.S. government should be more transparent and accountable.
